description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato Hotcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet Potato Hotcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stack three hotcakes on each plate and add mushroom mixture. Top hotcake stacks with 2 poached eggs and season with pepper to taste. Serve with spinach leaves.
